body_html:
We are always on the hunt for contributions to the API docs! If you have images you want to contribute, make a PR with the images, and we'll pull them into our image hosting system.

Agreed that many of these ops (such as space-to-depth and depth-to-space) could use more visuals, plus probably more code. Restating it so the task has bounds, we'd say that all the ops in this section should have images:

https://www.tensorflow.org/api_guides/python/array_ops#Slicing_and_Joining

which is ~30 ops that don't have images. I don't think I can close this with a quick change, so I'm setting this to "contributions welcome" and we'll track this suggestion internally as part of our ongoing API docs work.

which is ~30 ops that don't have images.  I don't think I can close this with a quick change, so I'm setting this to "contributions welcome" and we'll track this suggestion internally as part of our ongoing API docs work.
body:
We are always on the hunt for contributions to the API docs!  If you have images you want to contribute, make a PR with the images, and we'll pull them into our image hosting system.

Agreed that many of these ops (such as space-to-depth and depth-to-space) could use more visuals, plus probably more code.  Restating it so the task has bounds, we'd say that all the ops in this section should have images:

https://www.tensorflow.org/api_guides/python/array_ops#Slicing_and_Joining

which is ~30 ops that don't have images.  I don't think I can close this with a quick change, so I'm setting this to "contributions welcome" and we'll track this suggestion internally as part of our ongoing API docs work.
